# The `PerThreadAllocator` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/perthreadallocator">PerThreadAllocator</a> is used in conjunction with ThreadPoolExecutor to allow per-thread allocations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/perthreadallocator">PerThreadAllocator</a> is used in conjunction with ThreadPoolExecutor to allow per-thread allocations.

It wraps a possibly thread-unsafe allocator, e.g. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/perthreadallocator">PerThreadAllocator</a> must be used with only main thread or threads created by ThreadPoolExecutor, as it utilizes getThreadIndex, which is set by ThreadPoolExecutor. To work properly, ThreadPoolExecutor should be initialized before <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/perthreadallocator">PerThreadAllocator</a> is created. TODO: The same approach might be implemented for ThreadPool.

Definition at line 27 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/perthreadbumpptrallocator-h">PerThreadBumpPtrAllocator.h</a>.
